title: Barre Chords
summary: Build strength with E-shape and A-shape barre chords.
keyPoints: Start with E-shape and A-shape barre chord forms
Place the thumb behind the neck for leverage
Use the side of your index finger for the barre
Press close to the fret for a cleaner sound
Keep wrist straight and shoulders relaxed
Slide the shape to new frets to change keys
commonMistakes: Letting the thumb creep over the top
Only pressing with the index finger
Rushing to full barres before partial ones
practiceDrill: Play a partial barre on two strings at the 5th fret
Add one more string until all notes ring
Hold an E-shape barre for four slow strums
Release and shake out the hand between reps
Repeat on the A-shape at a comfortable fret
